name: Shielded Gauntlet Master
text: Your can effectively attack and defend with your gauntlet.

benefit: While using Shield Gauntlet Style, you no longer lose your shield bonus to AC when you attack with your gauntlet (or spiked gauntlet) or use it to hold a weapon.
